mosinstall.name: GJ Largest Groups
mosinstall.author: Anna Tannenberg
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
mosinstall.description: This module displays the largest groups in Groupjive

param.name: count
param.label: Number of Groups
param.description: This sets the number of largest groups to display

param.name: display_type
param.label: Display Group Type
param.description: To display the type of the listed largest groups.

param.name: display_number
param.label: Display Number Of Members
param.description: To display the number of members of the largest groups.

param.name: display_pic
param.label: Display Group Logo
param.description: To display thumbnails of the logos of the groups.

param.name: display_open
param.label: Display open Groups
param.description: To display open groups check yes.

param.name: display_aprequired
param.label: Display approval required Groups
param.description: To display approval required groups check yes.

param.name: display_private
param.label: Display private Groups
param.description: To display private groups check yes.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
